title: Place a Good-'Til-Canceled (GTC) Trade Order
description: A client wants to place a limit order to buy a stock, but wants the order to remain active until it's either filled or they cancel it.

tasks.description: Gather the trade details: buy, quantity, stock symbol, limit price, and time-in-force (GTC).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures all parameters for the GTC limit order.

tasks.description: Check the client's account for sufficient buying power.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the account has enough funds to execute the trade if the limit price is hit.

tasks.description: Place the GTC limit order and confirm its details with the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully places the open order and provides a confirmation.
